For a basic 250 square feet project in zip code 47474, the benchmark cost to Paint a Wall ranges between $0.79 - $1.57 per square foot* . To estimate costs for your project: 1. Set Project Zip Code Enter the Zip Code for the location where labor is hired and materials purchased. 2.

Labor Costs of about $.70 per square foot of wall/ceiling space. To figure this, multiply the perimeter of the room by the height..then, multiply by $.60. This will get you an approximate labor cost if there's not a lot of repair work needed. A 12x12x8 room will have about 384 square feet of wall space. 384' x $.70 = $270 (268.80) Paint for this room will run about $.20 per square foot of wall space. This will add about $70 to the price above if using a Benjamin Moore high quality paint. Then, sundries, or supplies will be added. They typical cost for this will be about $50 ($.13 per square foot) for a typical room
